sentence: Facilities are very clean and modern
Snug Acomodations and a Lobby Bar Close to the Airport
Amenities like free business center computer and printer free wifi pool gym free complimentary tea and coffee in room and lobby a full service bar and restaruant on premises and free wifi6
Reasonable price with nice amenities
Was able to grab a quick cocktail in the lobby
Close to the Sacramento Airport nice looking lobby
I appreciated the fact that the gym was available 247 and was very well equipped
The facility is clean and well appointed for the business traveler
Clean nicely decorated lobby
Easy check in clean facility friendly staff close to freeway and comfortable room
Had much nicer accommodations for much less money throughout the rest of our trip
During all the commotion I left my laptop in front of the lobby and when I got to the airport the driver called the hotel to report and told me they would mail it out
I arrived at 3 pm And there was no one at the reception no one who worked at the hotel any where to be seen no sign no bell no nothing

nice looking place liked that it had a bar trashy 24 hour pantrypaper thin walls and windows got zero sleep due to the outside conversations could hear every word of conversation of the people in the room beside them and then even their snoring and lots of noise from movement above floors and in hallways
Liked that I could work out in the gym but the tvs on the machines did not work
Last but not the least the GYM less said the better a
We usually book an AirBnB but were unable to find accommodations for this trip I will certainly book earlier next time to avoid this property
Soap and shampoo come out of large containers in the shower like at a gym
Very disappointing I always thought Sheraton was a nice hotel but I have stayed at super 8s that were cleaner and had more amenities than this over priced place
They ’re remodeling so the hallways look like a horror film but the rooms are nice beds are comfy
The rooms and lobby have been updated and it is looking more modern
Information about free 24 hr shuttle was not true and no accommodations from hotel was given eventhough the hotel information was given in error to Expedia
Really only stayed overnight and did not use the facilities and did not stay long enough to have breakfast
The minute I walked in the door the reception clerk asked if I were flying out the next day
Room had a weird wardrobe in the entrance making it awkward to enter
I have a handicap adult daughter who on oxygen I have machine that needs to be in room when she sleeps I did n’t know they were giving me a room up stairs 3rd floor
The thieves had popped the lock on the drivers side to gain entrance
I came back after a seven day trip to find my truck had been broken into and a duflebag of clothing and toiletries stolen from the back of my extended cab
This review is actually for renting their banquet hall
Snacks by main lobby were lacking BUT they did have a service where if you needed something they could get it
